name: Vicious Cycle (ryzy27)
description:
IMPORTANT: When turning on full-screen mode press Left Mouse Button in the game window. Otherwise your input will not register.

Game was tested and is meant to be played in 1366x768. 

Please use headphones for best experience.

Game made for Ludum Dare 45 by szupinek and ryzy27.

Vicious Cycle is a puzzle game that is best played without any explanation.

Play, explore and, hopefully, have fun!
